attributes.action: To take back his  congratulations to Christine Ohuruogu and force the British Olympic team mangement to not include her in their plans for 2012
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Christine Ohuruogu should never be allowed to represent Great Britain in sporting events.  She missed 3 out of season drug tests which brought a 12 month ban from racing.  Sport is trying to clear up its drug problems and having this person seemingly forgiven for drug test abuse would send out the wrong signals to future sports people of this country
